message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase this product for $14,000. I believe it would be highly beneficial to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I am willing to pay $12,000 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand the value you see in this product, but I'm aiming for a slightly higher price point. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $12,500 for the product.
